Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
literally: knowing (God); hence: = action by which humans, either as individuals or as groups, assume a position of subservience towards a deity
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility; ► the effectiveness of a curse partially depends on the authority of the one pronouncing it
= action by which humans say things that are not true in order to deceive or mislead others
= causative action by which humans take the life of other humans, whether or not intentionally

= action by which humans secretly take possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even of other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= action by which married humans have voluntary sexual intercourse with other humans who are not their spouse; ≈ often used as a metaphor for treachery or idolatry
= process by which events happen at a large scale and with much impact
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
literally: to touch; hence: = process by which one event follows directly after the other ◄ as if they were touching each other

= process by which plants and their products become devoid of moisture, and therefore lose color and bend over ◄ as if in mourning, ► which may ultimately result in death if circumstances do not change; ≈ associated with drought and destruction, often as punishment from God

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= state of being unable to function as can be expected; ◄ as a result of destruction, a drought, or God's direct intervention; ► results include weakness, sadness, shame, death, and disintegration, depending on the situation
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
possibly shortened form of נֶפֶשׁ חַיָּה living creature: = animal; ◄ generic, sometimes referring to all animals, sometimes limited to wild land animals only

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

Node.gloss: to be taken away|to die|to perish
Node.definition: = process by which a person or animal is removed from existence; ◄ either in a natural and peaceful manner or in an unnatural and violent way
= particle marking a proposition as contrastive, and so limiting the scope or impact of what was stated before
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
= action by which humans or deities express their disapproval of something with words

Node.gloss: to contend against|to bring charges against|dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: exact meaning is not at all clear but possibly = action by which a person or deity accuses or files a legal complaint against someone; but see also רִיב (רִיב)|= state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
literally: to stumble; hence: = process by which humans do not live up to the expectations others have of them

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
= process by which humans or objects are removed from existence, through death or total destruction

Node.gloss: mother > place of origin and sustenance
Node.definition: = a nation or a city representing a nation, ◄ here compared to a mother, and its citizens to her children who are responsible for her well being
= process by which humans or objects are removed from existence, through death or total destruction
= particle marking a proposition as not true
literally: knowing; hence: = a collection of information stored and processed in someone's mind that gives that person the ability to analyse, discern, make decisions and act accordingly
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
literally: knowing; hence: = a collection of information stored and processed in someone's mind that gives that person the ability to analyse, discern, make decisions and act accordingly
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events

Node.gloss: to act as priest|to serve as priest
Node.definition: = state in which humans have been ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to function as a priest (כֹּהֵן)
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= process by which people, objects, and events increase in number or frequency
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= state which provokes disdain from the general public or from a specific category of people ◄ due to one's behavior or condition
= causative action by which humans exchange an object, person, or deity that is in their possession or that they are associating with for another one
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment

Node.gloss: to count on|to be intent on|to desire
Node.definition: literally: to put (one's heart or soul) on something or someone; hence: = action by which humans turn to a deity or location with the confidence that they will find help and support there

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= action by which deities or humans inflict a penalty on other deities, humans, animals, or objects, usually as retribution for an offence
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= a pattern of activities performed by a person or deity, with the primary focus on whether these activities are good or evil

Node.gloss: to repay|to pay back|to punish|to reward
Node.definition: literally: to send back (to someone); hence: = causative process by which humans or deities case (other) humans or deities to receive the appropriate return for their actions, which can be either good or bad
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= process by which someone's desire for food is fulfilled

Node.gloss: to prostitute oneself|to play the prostitute
Node.definition: = action by which humans engage in prostitution; ≈ associated with unfaithfulness
= process by which humans and objects quickly increase in quantity and take up increasingly more space

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= action by which humans engage in non sanctioned worship, ◄ described in terms of prostitution

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction

= stick ◄ usually made of wood; ► attribute of a shepherd or a ruler, but also used for other purposes, such as beating, walking, divination, etc.; ≈ associated with shepherding, authority, punishment
= a spiritual entity coming over humans and triggering attitudes corresponding to its character and purpose
= action by which humans engage in non sanctioned worship, ◄ described in terms of prostitution
= action by which humans engage in non sanctioned worship, ◄ described in terms of prostitution
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity

= a large size tree found either alone or in clumps or forests; ◄ one of the varieties of |iQuercus|i*; ► functioned as landmarks, grave marks or gathering places; since its groves were considered sacred by Canaanites, ritual practices under them was always a temptation to Israelites, denounced in the texts as idolatry; ≈ their characteristics made them suitable symbols of a variety of attributes or attitudes

= a small tree or shrub, of 3 to 6 m high, with oval leaves that are green above and white and cottony below; it has white flowers that resemble those of the orange tree; ◄ Styrax officinalis; ► it gives good shade, and so provides a place for offering sacrifices

= terebinth; tree with a broad crown, heavy branches, and thick trunk; may reach a height of 7.5 to 9 m.; sheds its leaves; has small an inconspicuous flowers; ◄ pictacia terebinthus; ► its stem contains aromatic turpentine, a resinous juice, which flows out when the bark is cut; it provides pleasant shade; ≈ imposing tree, preferred place to sit under and enjoy the shade, associated with cultic worship
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= action by which humans engage in non sanctioned worship, ◄ described in terms of prostitution
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= wife of one's son
= action by which married humans have voluntary sexual intercourse with other humans who are not their spouse; ≈ often used as a metaphor for treachery or idolatry
= action by which deities or humans inflict a penalty on other deities, humans, animals, or objects, usually as retribution for an offence
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= action by which humans engage in non sanctioned worship, ◄ described in terms of prostitution
= wife of one's son
= action by which married humans have voluntary sexual intercourse with other humans who are not their spouse; ≈ often used as a metaphor for treachery or idolatry
= woman that sells her body for payment, making of this her profession; ≈ often associated with shame and sinful behavior
= action by which humans separate themselves from a larger group of people
= woman employed to have sexual intercourse with other people as part of local fertility rites; ► forbidden under Mosaic law

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= action by which humans engage in non sanctioned worship, ◄ described in terms of prostitution
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to be guilty|to be in the wrong|to have wronged
Node.definition: = to bear the responsiblity for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= location; ◄ close to Jericho (יְרִחֹו) ► first camp of Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) after crossing the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) here they set up twelve stones as a monument; it later became the location of a cultic center

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ≈ probably a pun or word play on the name Bethel (בֵּית־אֵל) (house of God)
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= female bovine; ► clean animal
= state by which humans or animals stand up to or oppose the authority of a person or ruler or deity
= state by which humans or animals stand up to or oppose the authority of a person or ruler or deity

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

= causative action by which humans lead domestic animals to places where they can feed on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= young of a sheep (שֶׂה) either male or female; ► eaten at Passover, and used for sacrifice; its fleece is used for clothing
= a large area of open land
= state in which someone is emotionally or mentally attached to someone else
= a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ► functioning as an object of non sanctioned worship
= reference to the northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) of which Ephraim was the most important tribe
= kind of alcoholic beverage

Node.gloss: to prostitute oneself|to play the prostitute
Node.definition: = action by which humans engage in prostitution; ≈ associated with unfaithfulness

Node.gloss: to prostitute oneself|to play the prostitute
Node.definition: = action by which humans engage in prostitution; ≈ associated with unfaithfulness
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
meaning unsure, possibly inf. abs. of יהב or אהב (אהב)
= state which provokes disdain from the general public or from a specific category of people ◄ due to one's behavior or condition
meaning unsure; possibly: = object given to someone else
= causative action by which some kind of force confines humans to one single place by completely surrounding them, ≈ as if they are physically bound or wrapped up

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense
